item.title: Intel exec says Arrow Lake launch ‘just didn’t go as planned’ - The Verge
item.description:

  2. Intel announces Arrow Lake fix coming within a month — Robert Hallock confirms poor gaming performance is due to optimization issues  Tom's Hardware
  3. MSI’s Exclusive “Memory Extension Mode” Brings Up To 21% Gaming Performance Improvement On Core Ultra 200S CPUs, Courtesy of Memory Optimizations  Wccftech
  4. Intel confirms Core Ultra 200 launch didn't go as planned, promises performance fix by early December  VideoCardz.com
  5. Intel pledges to ‘fix’ Arrow Lake after launch ‘didn’t go as planned’  PCWorld
